1: I wholeheartedly express gratitude in the assembly of the upright.
2: Great works attract those who delight in exploring them.
3: Honorable work shines; righteousness endures forever.
4: Wonderful works stay remembered; grace and compassion prevail.
5: Reverence receives provision, and promises endure forever.
6: Revealed power grants a shared inheritance among nations.
7: Truth and justice establish dependable ways to live.
8: Honest and just deeds endure forever.
9: Enduring covenant ensures ongoing redemption and inspires reverence.
10: Following wise instruction brings good understanding
